description: This file defines the root layout and navigation components for a React application built with Remix. It sets up global styles, external resource links, a top navigation bar, and the overall HTML structure for the app.

methods.name: links
methods.description: Returns an array of link objects for preconnecting and loading external stylesheets, including Google Fonts.

methods.name: Layout
methods.description: React component that provides the overall HTML structure, including <head> elements, navigation bar, and a container for page content.

methods.name: App
methods.description: Main component rendering the current route's outlet.
